pr_title: Ensure that users only receive notifications for their courses

timeline.message: small refactoring and code quality improvements
Remove shareReplay as notification cache ensures that get request is not send twice
Initialize notification observer on service instantiation
Clean up notification observer on log out
Remove now unnecessary service and repository methods
Clean up subscribedTopics in notification service on log out
Adjust SystemNotificationIntegrationTest to new parameter order of generateSystemNotification()

timeline.bodyText:
One thing regarding all the test cases:
You currently only check that the notification is returned when calling recent-for-user, which is totally fine.
I think you do not test right now that the notification is only delivered once (correct me if I'm wrong), so I propose you execute another call to the same endpoint again and verify that the list is either empty or does at least not contain notification1 and notification2.
The same applies to the other test cases.
timeline.author: sleiss
